about_the_game:
Serega Madness Pixel Adventures is a story-driven horror adventure in the horror-action-adventure genre (Top Down). This adventure is combined with the fun design of horror games. Trapped in a Pixel World full of the unknown and creatures, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to escape. This is the first chapter of the Serega Madness Pixel Adventures story.

IN THE GAME SEREGA MADNESS PIXEL ADVENTURES YOU WILL BE WAITING FOR:


  • Pixel world.
  • Hamster Serega is a terribly cunning and simply creepy hamster possessed by an evil spirit. He constantly stalks you.
  • Lots of chapters and puzzles.
  • Mini-games and riddles.
  • Battles and much more!

WELCOME TO THE PIXEL WORLD

You have found yourself in a pixel world - a place where many creatures live. Finding yourself in this unknown world, you understand that there is only one way out.

SEVEN CHAPTERS, ONE WAY TO SALVATION AND MANY SECRETS!

Find out what's hiding in this Pixel World. An exciting story awaits you that will not let you tear yourself away from the screen and take a breath! Find a way to escape from the unknown world, but do not forget that before you leave Pixel World, you will have to fight with Serega.

FEATURES:


  • Graphics: Pixel graphics in the game create a cozy atmosphere of adventure.
  • High quality: AAA quality graphics.
  • Unique enemies: Each chapter contains unique creatures that have their own artificial intelligence that is different from others. Players will have to change their tactics to survive.
  • Dangerous environment: Enemies are not the only danger. The pixel world is full of traps, obstacles and other dangers that you should beware of.

THIS IS SEREGA MADNESS PIXEL ADVENTURES!

Adventure horror game Serega Madness Pixel Adventures is now available on Steam - with puzzles, battles, scenes and graphics that will immerse you in a blood-curdling adventure.

short_description: Serega Madness Pixel Adventures — is a single player horror adventure game set in a pixel world. Solve interesting puzzles while hiding from the insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.
